scripts.setup: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const content = 'VITE_API_URL=http://localhost:3001\nVITE_API_KEY=your_local_api_key_here\n'; if (fs.existsSync('.env.local')) { console.log('.env.local already exists.'); process.exit(0); } fs.writeFileSync('.env.local', content); console.log('.env.local created with sample values. Please update it with your configuration.');"
